item.description:
SOUTH CARVER, MA – Join us on Sunday, November 21st from 4:00pm to 5:30pm for a Full Moon Hike. The Easthead Reservoir Trail is a magical place to explore by the light of the full moon. We will walk as the sun sets and by the light of the full moon along this beautiful 3-mile trail. Hopefully we’ll be able to see the moon reflected on the water as we hike or perhaps hear an owl or night heron!

Dress for the weather, wear good shoes, and bring water and a flashlight. Meet at Park Headquarters at 194 Cranberry Road in South Carver.

For adults and children 10+. Rain, storm or icy trail conditions will cancel. Call Amy at (508) 272-9376 for more information. For park info & directions, visit http://www.mass.gov/d.... This program is sponsored by the Massachusetts Department of Conservation & Recreation.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for DCR Regional Interpretive Coordinator Amy!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Full Moon Hike at Myles Standish State Forest
